title: Portfolio
text:
Through knowledge generation and synthesis, my research has informed mental health research and care for TB survivors internationally.


I was a co-organizer of this webinar as a member of the TB-Mental Health Working Group of the International Union Against TB and Lung Disease.





This review of evidence was structured based on an overview of systematic reviews that I presented on World TB Day during a TB-Mental Health Integration.




Can TB lead to a higher risk of depression? Does the lenght of stay in hospital following TB diagnosis mediate the risk of depression caused by TB? To answer these research questions, I planned and conducted a causal mediation analysis of depression risk following tuberculosis diagnosis. Furthermore, I formally evaluated the potential mediating role of the length of stay in hospital following TB diagnosis. Results were presented at two conferences and then published.
